mowun polisiya nowana bawata saka kala niwes himiya kagasamin porawakda ragena niwasin eliyata pamineddi kollakaruwan wan rathayen pala gos thibe.me kolla kalliya manchuwak saha pisthola dekak (02) ragena pamina rupiyal eklaksha hathalis dahasak (140000) pamana wana mudal da thun laksha wisipan dahasak (325000) pamana wana ran bhanda ha jangama durakathanayak soragena gos athayi polisiya kiyayi.niwase thibu yathuru padiyakda ragena yamata mowun uthsaha dara athi bawata anawaranaya we.
